currentVersion.notSetDescription: No Java version has been configured as active.

installVersion.loadError: Could not load versions. Check your internet connection.
installVersion.noVersions: No available versions could be loaded. Check your internet connection or if you need administrator permissions.

notifications.activateSuccess: Java version successfully set as active
notifications.activateRestart: You may need to restart some applications or your session to see the change.
notifications.welcome: Welcome to Cup Control. This application allows you to easily install and manage different Java versions.
